texts.es: Marlon es pequeño productor del sector de la comarca Camastro en Santo Domingo-Chontales, tiene una pequeña finca de 26 Mzs y su inventario ganadero es de 21 cbzs, de las cuales ordeña 7 vacas paridas que son los que le generan los ingresos que permiten alimentar a sus 2 hijos menores de 6 y 4 años respectivamente y su señora.  Ademas de dedicarse al cuido de ganado tambien se dedica a la siembra de cultivos agricolas de granos basicos como musaceas que le ayudan con el consumo familiar y complementar ingresos.  Este credito lo solicita para engordar 5 toretes para obtener mejores ganancias , su mayor sueño es poder mejorar la finca haciendo construccion de cercas y establecer pastos mejorados para su ganado.
texts.en:
Marlon is a small producer in the region of Camastro in Santo Domingo-Chontales. He has a small 45-acre farm and and around 21-head of livestock, which includes seven calving cows. These produce the income which allow him to feed his two young children aged 6 and 4 respectively and his wife. As well as caring for his livestock, he also cultivates agricultural crops, namely basic agricultural grains such as plantain which help with the family's diet and provide additional income. He has asked for this loan in order to fatten-up 5 young bulls in order to obtain a better profit. His greatest wish is to be able to improve his farm, by constructing enclosures and establishing better grazing for his livestock.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Fatten 5 young bulls

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Managua capital de Nicaragua, la señora Ana P. se dedica con muchísimo esfuerzo a su negocio de venta de productos festivos para toda actividad como lo son piñatas. Festones, vasos, platos, entre otros, todo con el propósito de llevar el sustento a su casa de habitación.

La razón por la que espera en Ceprodel es porque ha solicitado un crédito para la compra de los productos y por esta razón requiere de dicho crédito para suplir su negocio y continuar desarrollándose.
texts.en:
In the town of Managua, the capital of Nicaragua, Ana P. spends a huge amount of effort managing her business selling festive products for all sorts of activities, such as piñatas. Decorations, glasses, plates among other things: all with the aim of improving the sustenance of her home. The reason why she has placed her faith in Ceprodel is because she has asked for a loan to purchase these products because she needs this credit to stock her business and continue her self-development.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase festive products

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
Con dos hijos que mantener y con el compromiso de llevar el sustento a su casa la señora Felipa C. se dedica a su actividad de venta de ropa y zapatos en su establecimiento donde a diario se esfuerza para lograr las ventas y así mantener su hogar.

Hoy en día ha acudido a Ceprodel para obtener un crédito para la compra de la mercadería y es por esta razón que espera que su crédito sea otorgado y de esta manera seguir adelante en el negocio.
texts.en:
With two sons to look after and with a commitment to ensuring the maintenance of her home, Felipa C. sells clothes and shoes in an establishment where she works hard every day to make sales and thus support her home. She has now approached Ceprodel in order to obtain a loan to purchase merchandise and it is for this reason that she hopes that her credit will be authorised, so that in this way she will ensure her business' progress.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Omunaku Khama Group

texts.en:
Sarah L. has four businesses and is the treasurer of the Omunaku Khama Group from Jinja, Uganda. Sarah has been in the Omunaku Khama lending group for six years and has been able to use the loans she has received to make changes in her own life as well as providing employment to others in the community.

Sarah started her career as a businesswoman with a small restaurant. She used her first loan to buy food supplies in bulk. That investment allowed her to increase her profits at the restaurant enough that she was able to start a 200 broiler-chicken business. Broiler chickens are chickens that are raised to be eaten – they are different from the chickens that people raise for the eggs.

She was able to use the combined profits from these two businesses as well loans from Pearl, Kiva's partner, to buy some cows. She uses these cows to get milk to sell.

The combination of the profits from these three businesses and additional loans led to her final business! She now has a tap-water connection at her home that she allows the community to use for a small fee.

Sarah has some people who help her with her businesses as well as at her home. She has four children who are all in school. During the day, she and her employees are able to focus on Sarah’s businesses and then when the children come home they have lots of other work helping the children do the things school children do!

Sarah is requesting a loan of $475 to recapitalize her businesses. She would like to buy some additional broilers, purchase some bulk food supplies for her restaurant, and pay the water bill for her water pump.

loans.use: Buy chickens, pay the water bill and buy supplies for the restaurant

loans.name: Aleyda De Jesus

texts.es: Doña Aleyda  a sus 35 años de edad, es una mujer activa, trabaja en servicios domésticos desde hace dieciocho años, que inicio con la necesidad de apoyar a sus padres,  como para cubrir sus necesidades  personales, habita en Lomas de memorial sandino con una hija de 9 años de edad, que cursa el segundo grado, su esposo se desempeña como cadete de taxi, ella no dejo de trabajar para poder ayudarse entre si con los gastos y ahorrar para hacer su propia casa, en Afodenic esta es su sexta solicitud lo cual ha sido de mucho beneficios ya que ha podido hacer las mejoras a su casa y poder gozar con sus familia de una casa digna, con este préstamo va a comprar materiales de construcción para hacer un muro en frente de su casa, y poder estar segura y mejor protección para su hija. Sus planes a futuro es poder lograr tener una pulpería donde pueda gozar estar apoyando a su hija en casa.
texts.en:
Doña Aleyda, aged 35, is an active woman who has worked in domestic services since the age of 18, when she began working because of the need to help her parents and to cover her own personal expenses. She lives in Lomas de Memorial Sandino district with a 9 year old daughter who is currently in second grade. Her husband works as a taxi cadet. She hasn't stopped working though so she can help with the household bill sand save money for their own house. This is her sixth loan from Afodenic: her loans have been very beneficial and have already allowed her to improve her house and allow her family to enjoy a dignified home. With this loan she is going to purchase construction materials to make a wall in front of her house to provide security and better protection for their daughter. Their future plans are to be able to set-up a grocery store where she will be able to enjoy helping her daughter in the home.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase construction material to build a wall

loans.name: Odilia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Managua, en su casa de habitación la señora Odilia R. se dedica a su negocio de venta de cosméticos los cuales son comercializados a diario ofertándolos en sus vitrinas las cuales ha adquirido a raíz de sus esfuerzos.

Es importante destacar que ha solicitado un crédito en Ceprodel  y esto con el motivo de que se le han agotado los productos pero como toda mujer responsable y trabajadora ha buscado la manera de cómo salir adelante en el negocio.
texts.en:
In the city of Managua Mrs. Odilia R. works from her home selling cosmetics every day. She has them set up in a display cabinet and has obtained this all from her efforts. It is important to note that she has asked for a loan from Ceprodel because her products have sold out. However, as a responsible and hard-working woman she has searched for a way to get ahead in her business.

Translated from Spanish by Emily Meinecke, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy products

loans.name: Namulesa Twekembe Group

texts.en:
Sarah’s hair salon has been in business for 10 years and is well known in the community. Sarah often employs someone to help her since she tries to stay open at all times and her other responsibilities do not allow her to always be at the salon.

Sarah is looking for a loan of $550 to buy more products for her salon. Because Sarah mostly does women's hair, she will be buying hair-treatment chemicals, braids, and weaves.

Sarah continues to try to expand her business because she has four children of her own and six orphans to support. Although Sarah does have a husband, she says he is not helpful financially and thus the burden of providing for all ten children falls on her. All of the children she cares for are school-aged and so she has large school-fee bills each year.

With the profits that Sarah made with her last loan, she was able to start a second business running a calling station in front of her salon. Community members use this calling station to make calls if they do not have phones of their own. She hopes that this loan will be able to make her profits grow even more now that she has this second business.

loans.use: Purchasing hair-treatment chemicals, braids, and weaves

loans.name: Paula

texts.es: La señora Paula S. habita en el barrio los cocos ubicado hacia carretera la concepción junto a su hija, ella es madre soltera, desde hace veinticinco  años se dedica al comercio a la venta de comida y por las tardes la señora hace y vende tortilla , ella lleva siete financiamiento con Afodenic y ha logrado mejorar las condiciones de vida ; hasta tiene una venta la cual recientemente estableció en su hogar .Doña Paula con este octavo crédito va a incrementar su inventario ya que ella vende solo tres veces por semana comida y ahora la venta van a ser diarias el cual va comprar carnes, verduras y granos básicos para preparar los ricos alimentos el cual espera que sus ventas sean mayores y con mejores ganancias. A Futuro espera que su pulpería sea mas grande en inventario.
texts.en:
Paula S. lives with her daughter in the Los Cocos neighborhood near the La Concepcion highway. She is a single mother. For twenty five years she has sold meals. In the afternoons she makes and sells tortillas. She has had seven loans with Afondenic and has been able to improve her living conditions. Recently she has even set up to sell from her home. With this eighth loan Paula will increase her inventory. Up until now she has only sold meals three times a week, but with this loan she will sell daily. She will buy meat, vegetables and basic grains to prepare the delicious food which she hopes will increase her sales and earnings. She hopes to increase the selection in her mini market.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy meat, grains and vegetables

loans.name: Justa Alicia

texts.es:
En el Mercado Mayoreo de la ciudad de Managua, la señora Justa S. se dedica con mucho esfuerzo a su negocio de servicio telefónico por medio de alquiler del teléfono, venta de tarjetas telefónicas y servicio de recarga electrónica de teléfono.

Diariamente la señora Justa es muy visitada por sus clientes en su establecimiento y por esto es que se preocupa por mejorar su condición ya que hoy en día ha solicitado un crédito en Ceprodel para la compra de recargas para así satisfacer a sus clientes en su localidad.
texts.en:
Ms. Justa S. dedicates her efforts to her telephone service business, renting phones, and selling and recharging calling cards in Managua’s Mercado Mayoreo (Wholesale Market).

Justa’s customers frequent her shop everyday, which is why she is focused on improving her business. She is therefore requesting a loan from Ceprodel so that she can purchase more calling cards and meet customer demand in her area.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase telephone calling cards

loans.name: Sergio Enrique

texts.es: Sergio Enrique O. es un señor emprendedor y quiere seguir la tradicion de la familia. Sus papas siempre se dedicaron al negocio por muchos años ahoran ven que Sergio ya tiene la necesidad de formar una familia y darles un patrimonio como el que el tuvo. La mamá de sergio establecio el negocio hace 22 años en una colonia de la ciudad llamdo “Abarrotes Lucia”, el cual se lo esta transapasando a Sergio y con el tiene 2 años el quiere surtir bien el negocio para tener mas variedad, satesfacer las necesidades del cliente y obtener mas ingresos.
texts.en:
Sergio Enrique O. is an entrepreneur who wants to keep his family tradition alive. His parents have been in retail for many years, and they now realize that Sergio needs to form his own family and leave them an inheritance like the one that he had. Sergio’s mother set up a general store called “Abarrotes Lucia” 22 years ago in the neighborhood. She then handed the business over to Sergio, who has been running it for 2 years. He wants to stock his shop well so that he can offer a variety of products, meet customer demand, and earn greater profits.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase goods

loans.name: Blanca Lilia

texts.es: La señora Blanca Lilia M. y su esposo  Antonio Ramirez quieren comprar una combi ya que la que tiene ya esta muy deteriorada y desean sustituirla por una mejor. Ellos se dedican al transporte escolar ellos transfieren a niños y jovenes de la casa a la escuela y viseversa tienen  varias escuelas que perciben de su servicio. Pero ahora quieren un prestamo para enganchar esa combi para ya que sin ella no podran trabajar.
texts.en:
Mrs. Blanca Lilia M. and her husband, Antonio Ramirez, want to purchase a van because the one tat they currently own is too run down, so they want to replace it with a better one. They are in the school transportation business, transporting students from their homes to school and vice versa. They provide these services ath several schools. However, they now need a loan so that they can give a down payment for another van because they will not be able to work without it.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Down payment for a van

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: El señor pablo M. L.  vive con su esposa y sus dos hijas, el trabaja como guardia de seguridad de una empresa de la localidad, su esposa es operadora de una maquiladora,  sus dos hijas estudian la secundaria la mayor el tercer año y la mas chica primer año. Ellos tienen 12 años viviendo en su casa, esta es de interés social con el paso de estos años la tubería del baño se le pudrió y tienen que cambiarla desde abajo. Esta familia ha batallado con este problema lo cual comenta que calientan el agua en la estufa y llenan botes para poderse bañar.
texts.en:
Pablo M. L. lives with his wife and two daughters. He works as a security guard in a local business. His wife is an assembly plant operator. His two daughters go to elementary school. The older is in third grade and the younger is in first grade. They have lived in public housing for twelve years. Over the years, the plumbing in their home's bathroom has rotted and needs to be replaced. The family has battled with this problem, which they deal with by heating water on the stove and then filling containers with it in order to bathe.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Plumbing

loans.name: Felipe Norberto

texts.es:
En el municipio de Somotillo de la ciudad de Chinandega, el señor Felipe C. se ha destacado como productor agropecuario desde su juventud y hoy en día ha alcanzado vasta experiencia la cual le ha servido de mucho beneficio porque por medio de esta actividad mantiene su núcleo familiar.
Hoy en día el señor Felipe ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con un crédito que le permita la compra de ganado para su desarrollo ya que requiere adquirirlos para sacarle su provecho y de esta forma continuar manteniendo su hogar compuesto por sus tres pequeños hijos que tanto requieren del apoyo de su padre.
texts.en:
In the municipality of Somotillo in the city of Chinandega, Mr. Felipe C. has stood out as an excellent farmer since he was young. He now has extensive experience in this field, which has been of great benefit for him because this is how he supports his family.

He now turns to Ceprodel to request a loan that will permit him to purchase livestock so that he can keep supporting his three children who really need their father’s assistance.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase cattle

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
La familia del señor Isidro E. está compuesta por sus tres pequeños hijos y su cónyuge los cuales son mantenidos por el señor Isidro ya que él trabaja arduamente todos los días para el sustento de su hogar. El señor Isidro como todo padre responsable al ver la necesidad de invertir en su vivienda por el hecho de que ha estado en malas condiciones, ha decidido reconstruirla para mejorar la condición de vida de sus hijos y cónyuge en el municipio de Somotillo.
Para esto ha acudido a Ceprodel esperando que su crédito sea otorgado y de esta forma continuar en su obra de reconstrucción comprando los materiales de construcción para beneficiar a su familia que tanto necesita de su apoyo y así tener un techo y pared digna donde habitar.
texts.en:
Mr. Isidro E.’s family is comprised of his 3 young children and his wife, for whom he works arduously on a daily basis to cover the household expenses. Mr. E., like any responsible father, has decided to repair his house because it is in pretty bad shape and he wants to improve her family’s living conditions in the municipality of Somotillo. For this, he is turning to Ceprodel hoping to obtain a loan so that he can continue his home improvement work and purchase the building materials he needs. Thus, his family can benefit from having a decent dwelling.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase construction supplies

loans.name: Mukhlis

texts.ru: Бозоров Мухлис проживает в высокогорном кишлаке Ворух. В прошлом он был заведующим большим магазином в своем кишлаке. Несколько лет назад этот магазин был разделен между несколькими предпринимателями и Мухлис арендовал небольшой участок данного магазина и начал заниматься собственным бизнесом. Ассортимент его товаров составляет как продукты питания, так и различные промышленные товары. Мухлис старается привозить только качественные товары и с минимальной наценкой. Это в свою очередь позволяет ему иметь постоянных клиентов. С МикроИнвест сотрудничает уже более года и показал себя с лучшей стороны. На новый займ собирается закупить продукты питания.
texts.en:
Mukhlis B. lives in the a mountainous village Voruh. In the past he used to be a manager of a large store in his village. A few years ago this store was divided among several businessmen and Mukhlis has rented out a small area of this store and started doing his business. Assortment of his goods includes food products and different kinds of household goods. Mukhlis tries to bring only high quality goods with a small mark up price. This allows him to have regular customers. He has been with MicroInvest for more than a year and has shown himself from a good side. He plans to use the new loan to buy foodstuffs.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy foodstuffs

loans.name: Ayawa

texts.fr: Cette dame habite le quartier de tokoin ramco, elle pratique comme activité la vente de produits pharmaceutiques, elle fait ce commerce depuis 2002, actuellement son stock de produits est épuisé et elle a une demande à satisfaire, n’ayant jamais obtenu de crédit de wages, elle sollicite ce premier crédit afin de pouvoir s’acheter des produits pharmaceutiques, elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants.
texts.en:
This is a lady who lives in the Tokoin Ramco district. Her work involves selling pharmaceutical products. She has been in this business since 2002. Her inventory is exhaust right now, and she has to meet the demand. Never having been a recipient of a WAGES loan, she’s requesting this initial loan to buy pharmaceuticals. She is married and the mother of two.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy pharmaceutical products

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es:
En el municipio de Somotillo la señora Mariana N. se ha destacado por ser una excelente cocinera ya que se dedica al negocio de elaboración y venta de alimentos donde diariamente elabora deliciosos platillos los cuales son comercializados a sus clientes que le visitan a diario. 
Por tener la habilidad de cocinar muy bien y con el objetivo de mantener a sus pequeños tres hijos la señora Mariana ha decidido desarrollar el negocio y para esto ha buscado el apoyo en Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito. Con este crédito logrará la compra de la materia prima para elaboración de sus alimentos que tanto agradan a sus clientes.
texts.en:
In the municipality of Somotillo, Ms. Mariana N. stands out as an excellent cook because she prepares and sells meals for a living. She prepares her delicious dishes and sells them to her customers who visit her on a daily basis.

Because she has great cooking skills, and because her goal is to support her young children, Mariana has decided to further develop the business, which is why she is seeking Ceprodel’s support via a loan. With this loan, she will purchase the ingredients she needs to prepare the dishes that her customers like so much.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for meals

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es:
En el municipio de Somotillo de la ciudad de Chinandega, la señora Martha M. con mucho esfuerzo se dedica a su actividad de ebanistería el cual aprendió desde muy pequeña y hoy ha adquirido muchas habilidades en este trabajo. 
Antes de dedicarse a este negocio, ella trabajaba ambulantemente pero al ver la necesidad de mejorar las condiciones de su hogar y de sus dos hijos decidió poner su negocio en su propia casa y a pesar de las difíciles circunstancias económicas que ha atravesado ha logrado salir adelante. Por esto es que ella espera en que Ceprodel le proporcione un crédito para la compra de la madera para llevar a cabo los trabajos y de esta forma continuar en el mantenimiento de su amado hogar y familia.
texts.en:
In the Somotillo municipality of the city of Chinandega, Martha M. works very hard at her cabinet-making business. She learned the trade as a young girl and has now acquired many skills. She worked as a street vendor before starting this business, but seeing that she needed to improve her living conditions and the quality of life of her two children, she decided to relocate her business to her home. Despite the economic difficulties she has faced, she has come out ahead. For this reason, she hopes that Ceprodel will provide her with a loan in order to purchase the wood she needs to accomplish her work and continue to support her beloved home and family.

Translated from Spanish by Carolyn McCaffrey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase wood

loans.name: Yaovi François

texts.fr: Ce monsieur habite le quartier d’adidogomé, il est marié et a eu avec sa femme un enfant, dans son quartier de résidence il y a beaucoup de chantier en construction c’est pour cela qu’il a commencé depuis 2007 le commerce de quincallerie  qui d’ailleurs marche bien pour lui, actuellement il a une demande en cours mais son stock est épuisé c’est pour ça qu’il demande à wages son deuxième crédit pour pouvoir acheter des marchandises pour son activité de quincaillerie.
texts.en:
This is a gentleman who lives in the Adidogomé district. He is married, and he and his wife have a child. In the area where he lives, there are many construction sites. This is why in 2007 he started doing commerce in hardware, which furthermore is going well for him. He has ongoing demand right now, but his inventory is exhausted, so he's requesting from WAGES his second loan in order to buy some merchandise for his hardware business.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy hardware

loans.name: Atkham

texts.ru: Юнусов Атхам является директором профессионально технического училища в поселке городского типа Шуроб. Ему 51 год, женат и воспитывает 4 детей. Зарплаты преподавателя не хватает на нормальную жизнь и поэтому со старшим сыном Атхам занимается мелким предпринимательством – он покупает и продает сушеные абрикосы. Капитал его бизнеса небольшой, но позволяет покрывать некоторые расходы семьи. Атхам решил подать заявку на получение займа, потому что сейчас низкие цены на сухофрукты и есть возможность получить хорошую прибыль.
texts.en:
Atkham Y. is a principle of a professional technical college in the small town of Shurob. He is 51 years old, he is married and raises four children. His professor's salary is not enough to lead a normal life and this is why he has a small business with his older son. He buys and sells dry apricots. He has a small business capital, but it covers some of his family's expenses. Atkham decided to apply for a loan because the prices for dry fruit are low right now and he has an opportunity to make a good profit.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy dry fruit in wholesale

loans.name: Azetou

texts.fr: Cette dame est une cliente fidèle de wages qui vit dans le quartier de bè klikamé, un quartier périphériques de lomé, elle a pour activité la vente de charbons de bois et de maïs, elle fait ce commerce depuis 1995, actuellement la demande qu’elle a est supérieure  ce qu’elle peut offrir à ses clients,elle demande alors à wages un second crédit pour acheter des sacs de charbons de bois et de sacs de maïs.
texts.en:
This lady is a loyal WAGES client who lives in Bè Klikamé, an outlying district of Lomé. Her work involves selling charcoal and corn. She has been in this business since 1995. Right now, the demand she's facing is greater than what she can offer to her customers. So she's asking WAGES for a second loan to buy sacks of charcoal and sacks of corn.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy charcoal and corn

loans.name: Mokhikhon

texts.ru: Мохихон вместе со своим мужем занимается предпринимательством на местном рынке г. Исфары. Они продают пшеницу, кукурузу, мелкое зерно. Опыт работы составляет несколько лет. Этот бизнес у них хорошо налажен и приносит доход в их небольшой семейный бюджет. Мохихон 41 год и имеет 2 детей. Она собирается и дальше расширять свой бизнес и чтобы осуществить все свои планы хочет получить займ.
texts.en:
Mokhikhon and her husband do business in the Isfara city market. They sell wheat, corn, and other fine grains. They have several years of experience. This business is well established and provides income for their small family budget. Mokhikhon is 41 years old and has two children. She is going to expand her business, but to carry out her plans she requires a loan.

Translated from Russian by Melissa Kniazeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying grain wholesale

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es: El señor Jorge Antonio labora para una maquiladora desde hace un año, como operador de línea, su esposa la señora Mayra trabaja como encargada del área de limpieza en una boutique de la ciudad; ellos están solicitando este crédito para la colocación de protecciones y alambreras para la seguridad de su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge Antonio has been working at an assembly plant for a year as a line operator. His wife Mayra works at a boutique in the city, where she is in charge of cleaning. They are requesting this loan to put in place security measures and window screens, for the safety of their family.

Translated from Spanish by Vivian Lu, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Install protection measures and window screens in residence

loans.name: Aldo Eduardo

texts.es: El señor Aldo labora para una empresa de transportes como chofer de patio, con una antigüedad de 2 años, su esposa la señora Gabriela es ama de casa y lo apoya en cada uno de sus proyectos, ahora tienen el deseo de construir una barda en el frente de su casita, es por lo que están solicitando este crédito.
texts.en:
Aldo has worked as a driver for a transport company for two years. His wife, Gabriela, is a housewife and supports him in all of his endeavors. Now they would like to build a wall in front of their house, which is why they're seeking this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construct a wall in front of his house

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La señora Juana trabaja en una clínica reconocida de la ciudad como enfermera con una antigüedad de 8 años, su esposo el señor Francisco labora como albañil independiente desde hace 7 años, ellos son una familia muy trabajadora y están solicitando este crédito para la colocación del vitropiso en su vivienda, el cónyuge se hará cargo de la colocación ya que el se dedica a este tipo de proyectos.
texts.en:
Juana S. G. has worked as a nurse for 8 years in a well-known clinic in the city. Her husband Francisco has worked as an independent builder for 7 years. Their family is very hardworking and they are requesting this loan to buy ceramic floor tiles for their home. Francisco will install the ceramic floor tiles as he often works on this type of project.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Chong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Installation of ceramic floor tiles

loans.name: Ietidal

texts.en:
Ietidal is a 50-year-old woman who lives in Tyre, in southern Lebanon with her husband and their three children. Ietidal has owned a grocery store since 1997. She requested a loan of $1000 USD from Al Majmoua in order to purchase merchandise for her store. This is his third loan, and she has repaid the other loans on time. 

Her previous loans helped her improve her store as well as improve her income. Her clients are her friends, neighbors, and others. She decided on doing this business because she always wanted to work and supplement her family’s income. In the future, she plans on expanding her store by diversifying her merchandise.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her store
